question: Have been taking Itraconazole and Prednisolone for years with no improvementPresent igE level is 2500 and EOS level between 25 and 30.I do not have any breathing difficulties at present.I am using Sereflo 250 twice a day.I am also having Type II Diabetes which is under control.My doctor is not able to understand the high levels despite medication.Can somebody throw light about this condition and offer suggestions.
title: High igE levels and high EOS count
